member.name: P:MonoAudio.Units.Frame
member.summary:
The is a packed unit of multiple audio s.
A single contains the same number of samples as the channel of the stream.
For example, the length of frames in the 2ch audio data in bytes is sizeof(float) * 4, which is 16.

member.name: P:MonoAudio.Units.Sample
member.summary:
The is a smallest unit of the multi-channel discrete(digital) audio data.
The besides channel-by-channel, so the length of frame in bytes is the size of the sample itself, multiplied by the number of channels.

member.name: T:MonoAudio.Conversion.Resampling.Sample.SplineResampler
member.summary: Performs up-sampling using Catmull-Rom Spline interpolation.
Performs up-sampling using Catmull-Rom Spline interpolation.

member.name: F:MonoAudio.Conversion.Resampling.Sample.SplineResampler.preCalculatedCatmullRomCoefficents
member.summary:
The pre calculated catmull-rom coefficents.
X: The coefficent for value1 ((-xP3 + 2 * xP2 - x) * 0.5f)
Y: The coefficent for value2 (((3 * xP3) - (5 * xP2) + 2) * 0.5f)
Z: The coefficent for value3 ((-(3 * xP3) + 4 * xP2 + x) * 0.5f)
W: The coefficent for value4 ((xP3 - xP2) * 0.5f)
